page.title: 12Crane Moor 4
page.content: Below the school above the village of Crane Moor we have a recreation field.People in the village have been restoring it now for four years.We now have seats, a tennis court, picnic tables and a football pitch. We use it for our school games as well as the rest of the village. It used to be covered with brambles and hawthorns but we had some diggers in and had a big bonfire. Then the tractors rotivated it and spread seed. A tractor comes from Penistone to cut it every fortnight. Workmen have put up a fence to stop the ball going onto the road. We will soon have some swings and a climbing frame from the money from the Gala they have here.
